pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 会員の名前をいつ登録したのか。
lessons.english: When did they register the names of the members?

lessons.japanese: 悪漢は金銭登録機のお金を要求した。
lessons.english: The bandits demanded all money in the register.

lessons.japanese: その名前では誰も学校の名簿に登録されていません。
lessons.english: No person by that name is listed in the register of the school.

lessons.japanese: 明日までに履修する科目の登録をしなければなりまれん。
lessons.english: We must register for the courses that we're going to take by tomorrow.

lessons.japanese: 必ず本人が登録用紙に記入して下さい。
lessons.english: Be sure to fill out the registration form in person.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は地域の大学の夜間授業２クラスに登録した。
lessons.english: She's signed up for a couple of night classes at the local college.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは彼を陪審員として登録した。
lessons.english: They enrolled him as a jury member.

lessons.japanese: 登録用紙は無料で入手できます。
lessons.english: I am able to obtain a registration form for free.

lessons.japanese: 登録の必要のない試用版は配ってもかまいません。
lessons.english: It is OK to redistribute the unregistered trial version.

lessons.japanese: 先生の秘書のおかげで秘密の登録テクニックがわかった。
lessons.english: I found out about a back-door registration technique from his secretary.

lessons.japanese: 申込書に記入した後で、登録係から手数料が８ドルだといわれた。
lessons.english: After she filled out the application, the records clerk told her that the fee was eight dollars.

lessons.japanese: 新しい客はホテルの宿帳に登録せねばならない。
lessons.english: New guests must register in the hotel book.

lessons.japanese: 今登録されれば、１年間無料です。
lessons.english: Join now and pay nothing for a whole year.
